summary: LEFT FRONT STRUT IS LEAKING, MY CAR VIBRATES SO SEVERELY THAT I CANNOT DRIVE OVER 40 MPH.  THERE ARE NO STRUTS IN THE USA - ON CRITICAL BACK ORDER.  MY DEALERSHIP HAS SEEN NOTICEABLE QUANTITIES OF THIS PROBLEM.  THE 2001 CIVIC HAS A NEW SUSPENSION SYSTEM IN IT, AND IT IS FLAWED IN MY OPINION.  MY CAR HAS NEVER BEEN IN A WRECK, AND DOES MOSTLY INTERSTATE DRIVING.   *NLM
